verses.verse: <S%G3779>So<s%> <S%G3049>let<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G3049>think<s%> of <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>'s <S%G5257>servants,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3623>stewards<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>'s <S%G3466>mysteries.<s%>
<S%G3063>Here,<s%> moreover, <S%G3739><s%> it is <S%G2212>required<s%> <S%G1722>of<s%> <S%G3623>stewards,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G5100>they<s%> be <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G4103>faithful.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> with <S%G1698>me<s%> <S%G1519>it<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> a very small <S%G1646>thing<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> I should be <S%G350>judged<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G5216>you,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G442>man<s%>'s <S%G2250>judgment.<s%> <S%G235>Yes,<s%> I <S%G3761>don't<s%> <S%G350>judge<s%> my own <S%G1683>self.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> I <S%G4894>know<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> against <S%G1683>myself.<s%> <S%G235>Yet<s%> <S%G1344>I<s%> am <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1344>justified<s%> <S%G5129>by<s%> <S%G1722>this,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> who <S%G350>judges<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

<S%G5620>Therefore<s%> <S%G2919%G99999>judge<s%> <S%G3361>nothing<s%> <S%G4253%G99999>before<s%> the <S%G2540>time,<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2064>comes,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> will <S%G2532>both<s%> bring to <S%G5461>light<s%> the hidden <S%G2927>things<s%> of <S%G4655>darkness,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5319>reveal<s%> the <S%G1012>counsels<s%> of the <S%G2588>hearts.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5119>Then<s%> each <S%G1538>man<s%> <S%G1096>will<s%> <S%G1096>get<s%> his <S%G1868>praise<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> these <S%G5023>things,<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> I have in a figure <S%G3345>transferred<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G1683>myself<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G625>Apollos<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> your <S%G5209>sakes,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%> you might <S%G3129>learn<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> to <S%G5426>think<s%> <S%G5228>beyond<s%> the things <S%G3739>which<s%> are <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G3361>none<s%> of <S%G1520>you<s%> be puffed <S%G5448>up<s%> <S%G5228><s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2087>another.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G1252>makes<s%> <S%G4571>you<s%> <S%G1161>different?<s%> And <S%G5101>what<s%> do <S%G2192>you<s%> have <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G2192>you<s%> <S%G2983><s%> <S%G3756>didn't<s%> <S%G2983>receive?<s%> <S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G2532><s%> you did <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G5101>it,<s%> why do you <S%G2744>boast<s%> as <S%G5613>if<s%> you <S%G2983>had<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> received <S%G2983>it?<s%>

You <S%G2075>are<s%> <S%G2235>already<s%> <S%G2880>filled.<s%> You have <S%G2235>already<s%> become <S%G4147>rich.<s%> You have come to <S%G936>reign<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> <S%G2257>us.<s%> <S%G2532>Yes,<s%> and I <S%G3785>wish<s%> <S%G1065>that<s%> you did <S%G936>reign,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> might <S%G4821>reign<s%> with <S%G5213>you.<s%>

<S%G1063>For,<s%> I <S%G1380>think<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G584>displayed<s%> <S%G2248>us,<s%> the <S%G652>apostles,<s%> <S%G2078>last<s%> of <S%G5613>all,<s%> like men sentenced to <S%G1935>death.<s%> <S%G3754>For<s%> we are <S%G1096>made<s%> a <S%G2302>spectacle<s%> to the <S%G2889>world,<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> to <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G444>men.<s%>

<S%G2249>We<s%> are <S%G3474>fools<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>'s sake, <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> are <S%G5429>wise<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%> <S%G2249>We<s%> are <S%G772>weak,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> are <S%G2478>strong.<s%> <S%G5210>You<s%> have <S%G1741>honor,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> have <S%G820>dishonor.<s%>

Even <S%G891>to<s%> this <S%G737>present<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> <S%G3983>we<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3983>hunger,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1372>thirst,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> are <S%G1130>naked,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> are <S%G2852>beaten,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> have no certain dwelling <S%G790>place.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> We <S%G2872>toil,<s%> <S%G2038>working<s%> with our <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G5495>hands.<s%> When people <S%G3058>curse<s%> <S%G2127>us,<s%> we bless. Being <S%G1377>persecuted,<s%> we <S%G430>endure.<s%>

Being <S%G987>defamed,<s%> we <S%G3870>entreat.<s%> We are <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G4027>filth<s%> of the <S%G2889>world,<s%> the <S%G4067>dirt<s%> wiped off by <S%G3956>all,<s%> even <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G737>now.<s%>

I <S%G3756>don't<s%> <S%G1125>write<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> to <S%G1788>shame<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> to <S%G3560>admonish<s%> you <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G5043>children.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1437>though<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> ten <S%G3463>thousand<s%> <S%G3807>tutors<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G235>yet<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G3962>fathers.<s%> <S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> became <S%G5209>your<s%> <S%G1080>father<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the Good <S%G2098>News.<s%>
I <S%G3870>beg<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> <S%G1096>be<s%> <S%G3402>imitators<s%> of <S%G3450>me.<s%>

<S%G1223>Because<s%> of <S%G5124>this<s%> I have <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G5095>Timothy<s%> to <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G5043>child<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G363>will<s%> <S%G363>remind<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> of <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3598>ways<s%> which <S%G3588>are<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> even <S%G2531>as<s%> I <S%G1321>teach<s%> <S%G3837>everywhere<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1577>assembly.<s%>
<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> are puffed <S%G5448>up,<s%> as <S%G5613>though<s%> <S%G3450>I<s%> <S%G2064>were<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2064>coming<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G5209>you.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> I will <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G5030>shortly,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> is <S%G2309>willing.<s%> <S%G2532>And<s%> I will <S%G1097>know,<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of those <S%G3588>who<s%> are puffed <S%G5448>up,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> the <S%G1411>power.<s%>
<S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G932>Kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3056>word,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1411>power.<s%>

<S%G5101>What<s%> do <S%G2309>you<s%> <S%G2064>want?<s%> Shall I come <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> a <S%G4464>rod,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> a <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G4236>gentleness?<s%>
